%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]STONE SKIN
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Passive +15% melee damage protection
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Receiving melee damage grants a stack of 'Stone Skin'
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]+15% melee damage protection/-10% movement speed per 'Stone Skin' stack
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Maximum 10 stacks
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]At 10 stacks, +75% melee damage reduction but become completely immobilized
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Effect lasts 10 seconds, after which all stacks are removed
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]-15% bullet damage received

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]CRITICAL ASCENSI0N
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Passive +10% critical hit damage bonus
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Consecutive hits grant stacks of 'Critical Ascensi0n'
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Each stack of 'Critical Ascensi0n' grants +5% damage to next shot
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Missing a shot removes all stacks and gives psy damage proportional to the amount of stacks removed
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Bonus can be stacked infinitely as long as you don't miss
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Unequipping all 'Spike' artefacts will remove stacks without penalty
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]LIGHT OF TRANQUILITY
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Restores health and psy health while near campfires
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Amplifies psy recovery artefacts while near campfires
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]MINOR LACERATIONS
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Your weapon loses 50% damage but gains the ability to cause %c[ui_red]bleeding %c[ui_gray_2]damage
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Bleeding damage is proportional to weapon damage
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Increases chance for enemies to surrender
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]ZONE ALCHEMY
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Grants the ability to transmutate artefacts
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Artefacts can be upgraded to a better tier (Night Star-> Gravi-> Gold Fish), or "mutated" to a different artifact of the same tier (Night Star-> Stone Blood-> Jellyfish)
 %c[0,255,255,255]•%c[0,255,255,255]Perk/Top-tier artefacts can only be mutated
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Each transmutation will consume one 'Bat' artefact
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]SOLAR POWERED
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Grants stat modifiers depending on the current weather:
 %c[0,255,255,255]- %c[ui_gray_2]Clear: health and stamina boost
 %c[0,255,255,255]- %c[ui_gray_2]Partly Clear: small stamina boost
 %c[0,255,255,255]- %c[ui_gray_2]Other: stamina penalty
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]WILL TO LIVE
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Grants health regen while under 25% health
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Effect increases the closer you are to death
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]WEIGHT OF DEVOTION
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Passive small health and stamina regen
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Members of Sin are granted triple the effect with the addition of psy health regeneration
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Sin companions receive health regen
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]ARSZI'S BLESSING
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Radiation illness grants a stamina boost and slight radiation removal
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]THE UNORTHODOX WAY OF TRAVELLING
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Killing anyone will teleport you to the location of their death
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Dangerous if used on airborne targets
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]DEAL WITH THE DEVIL
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Moving the artefact to the belt will sign the 'Pact with the Zone'

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_red]Highly recommended to save before activation.

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]INSANITY
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Passive strong psy resistance
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Drains psy health to restore health
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]When health is full, restores psy health
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_red]There is a chance you will become possessed and perform an uncontrollable action
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_red]The lower your psy health, the higher the chance and severity of the action
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]ZONE INFUSION
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Stepping into anomalies of various types will infuse your active weapon for 3 minutes
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Infused weapons lose 30% damage output but gain 50% elemental damage output according to the anomaly
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Only electric, thermal and chemical anomalies are valid for infusion
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]You can drop an artefact directly onto a weapon to destroy the artefact and infuse the weapon with a random effect for 10 minutes
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]CALORIC COAGULATION
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Drains hunger to cure bleeding
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Reflections nullify damage
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Makes you completely invisible
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]90 second duration
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]During invisibility, you may not draw a weapon, talk or 'interact'
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]May make some companions suspicious
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Bleeding recovery and movement speed are increased from dusk till dawn

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Allows a mighty mutant kick
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]STUNNER
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Chance to stun mutant if within 2 meters
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Getting hit by a melee attack will stun the attacker for 3 seconds
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]While stunned, the enemy is unable to attack
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Self harm (i.e. fall damage) will result in artefact discharge
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,255,255,255]Perk: %c[d_orange]CULINARY HYPERVERSITY
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Convert energy of raw mutant meat into special abilities
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Lasts for 60 seconds
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Eating different mutant meat will override current effect and restart buff timer

 %c[d_orange]Table of Effects:
 %c[0,255,255,255]- Flesh meat: %c[ui_gray_2]1%/sec health regen, 33% bullet damage penalty
 %c[0,255,255,255]- Boar meat: %c[ui_gray_2]25% melee damage reduction
 %c[0,255,255,255]- Dog meat: %c[ui_gray_2]slight bleeding recovery, 1%/sec psy regen
 %c[0,255,255,255]- Pseudodog: %c[ui_gray_2]2%/sec psy regen, 25% psy damage reduction
 %c[0,255,255,255]- Bloodsucker: %c[ui_gray_2]become invisible until a hostile action is performed, moderate bleeding recovery
 %c[0,255,255,255]- Psysucker: %c[ui_gray_2]become invisible until performing a hostile action, 5%/sec psy regen
 %c[0,255,255,255]- Snork: %c[ui_gray_2]50% radiation damage reduction, 5%/sec stamina regen, 5msv/sec radiation cure, large hunger decrease
 %c[0,255,255,255]- Chimera: %c[ui_gray_2]2%/sec health regen, 10%/sec stamina regen, 33% radiation damage reduction
 %c[0,255,255,255]- Lurker: %c[ui_gray_2]33% chem/fire/electric anomaly damage reduction
 %c[0,255,255,255]- Tushkano: %c[ui_gray_2]20% speed increase, 20% melee damage penalty
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Upon receiving a fatal blow, the artefact is destroyed and the player is revived
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]50% of health is restored, all debuffs are removed and 5 seconds of damage immunity are granted upon revival
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Upon revival, the current weapon is dropped and vision is negatively effected
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]3.5% of melee damage is converted to health
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Upon killing certain mutants, there is a chance that raw meat will spawn in the vicinity
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,255,255,255]• %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO
